channel.title: Night time skybox glitch
channel.description: So, I have played a lot of Black Mesa but each time I get to the outside area of On a Rail, or a multiplayer map that is night based, I see that really cool realistic effect on the stars that makes them blink but, after some time, they just stop blinking and are only doing it when I the player move its kind of upsetting.

item.title: Night time skybox glitch
item.dc:creator: General_Gravel
item.description:
So, I have played a lot of Black Mesa but each time I get to the outside area of On a Rail, or a multiplayer map that is night based, I see that really cool realistic effect on the stars that makes them blink but, after some time, they just stop blinking and are only doing it when I the player move its kind of upsetting.
